name: Zombies from Another Planet [Demo]
description:
An alien-zombie game

ZOMBIES FROM ANOTHER PLANET

---
This is a demo for a zombie game. The game is in a "completed state," but more main gameplay mechanics are to be added. This version is fully playable and decently polished though, and if you find any bugs let me know!

---

DEMO INCLUDES:

-A classic zombie shooter experience.

-Four weapons

-"UFO Excavation Site" level.

-Familiar First Person controls.

-Complete game loop with endless rounds.

-Ammo and health pickups

-Fully animated zombie-aliens

---

Walk - W,A,S,D

Reload - R

Jump - SPACE 

Look - Mouse Movement 

Shoot - Left Mouse Button
